I’m an assistant professor of digital media in the School of Journalism and Mass Communication at Texas State University. I study online labor and technology adaptation.

Recently I’ve written about spaceships, climate change and optimism; Twitter marketing and Tupperware and the most depressing side of the gig economy for The Outline.

Academic publications in: First Monday, Social Media + Society, ACM Proceedings on Human-Computer Interaction and Designing Interactive Systems, Journal of Documentation and Journal of the Association for Information Science and Technology.
